The 6th International Workshop on
Artificial Intelligence and Statistics

[edit]

January 4 - 7, 1997
Ft. Lauderdale, FL, USA

The 6th International Workshop on Artificial Intelligence and Statistics (Artificial Intelligence and Statistics 1997) will be held in Ft. Lauderdale, FL, USA from Saturday, 4 January 1997 to Tuesday, 7 January 1997 at the Radisson Bahia Mar Beach Resort.

Since its inception in 1985, AISTATS has been an interdisciplinary gathering of researchers at the intersection of artificial intelligence, machine learning, statistics, and related areas.

The Proceedings of Artificial Intelligence and Statistics 1997 are now available.
